quote: I couldn't escape him, now or ever. He'd always be there, consuming my every thought, my heart locked in his hands. I was drawn to him by forces I couldn't control, let alone escape.
quote_letters: I COULDNT ESCAPE HIM NOW OR EVER HED ALWAYS BE THERE CONSUMING MY EVERY THOUGHT MY HEART LOCKED IN HIS HANDS I WAS DRAWN TO HIM BY FORCES I COULDNT CONTROL LET ALONE ESCAPE
